title: American Horror Story
plot: Physical and psychological horrors affect a decomposing family, workers and residents of an insane asylum, a coven of witches, a cast of circus freaks, the employees and guests at a struggling hotel, a family who moved into a mysterious farmhouse, the members of a small suburb in Michigan, the surviving members of the Apocalypse and the counselors of a creepy summer camp in this haunting anthology series, focusing on the themes of infidelity, sanity, oppression, discrimination, addiction and exploitation.
awards: Won 2 Golden Globes. Another 125 wins & 387 nominations.
stars: Lady Gaga, Kathy Bates, Angela Bassett, Sarah Paulson
companies: FX Network, Brad Falchuk Teley-Vision, Ryan Murphy Productions

trailer.title: American Horror Story
trailer.videoDescription: The ninth season of "American Horror Story" travels back to 1984 to celebrate slasher genre.

similars.title: The Haunting of Hill House
similars.plot: Flashing between past and present, a fractured family confronts haunting memories of their old home and the terrifying events that drove them from it.
similars.stars: Michiel Huisman, Carla Gugino, Henry Thomas

similars.title: Ratched
similars.plot: In 1947, Mildred Ratched begins working as a nurse at a leading psychiatric hospital. But beneath her stylish exterior lurks a growing darkness.
similars.stars: Sarah Paulson, Finn Wittrock, Cynthia Nixon

similars.title: American Horror Story FreakShow: Extra-Ordinary-Artists
similars.plot: Behind the scenes with the ''Freaks'' of American Horror Story as they tell their life stories, what they have gone through, and how it has impacted them. It's an inspiration documentary ... See full summary »
similars.stars: Jyoti Amge, Erika Ervin, Mat Fraser

similars.title: Black Mirror
similars.plot: An anthology series exploring a twisted, high-tech multiverse where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.
similars.stars: Daniel Lapaine, Hannah John-Kamen, Michaela Coel

similars.title: Stranger Things
similars.plot: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.
similars.stars: Millie Bobby Brown, Finn Wolfhard, Winona Ryder

similars.title: The Walking Dead
similars.plot: Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive.
similars.stars: Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, Melissa McBride

similars.title: Lost
similars.plot: The survivors of a plane crash are forced to work together in order to survive on a seemingly deserted tropical island.
similars.stars: Jorge Garcia, Josh Holloway, Yunjin Kim

similars.title: The Vampire Diaries
similars.plot: The lives, loves, dangers and disasters in the town, Mystic Falls, Virginia. Creatures of unspeakable horror lurk beneath this town as a teenage girl is suddenly torn between two vampire brothers.
similars.stars: Nina Dobrev, Paul Wesley, Ian Somerhalder

similars.title: Supernatural
similars.plot: Two brothers follow their father's footsteps as hunters, fighting evil supernatural beings of many kinds, including monsters, demons and gods that roam the earth.
similars.stars: Jared Padalecki, Jensen Ackles, Jim Beaver

similars.title: Scream Queens
similars.plot: A semi-anthology series that centers on characters being terrorized by a serial killer in different locations, including a university and a hospital.
similars.stars: Emma Roberts, Lea Michele, Abigail Breslin

similars.title: Dexter
similars.plot: By day, mild-mannered Dexter is a blood-spatter analyst for the Miami police. But at night, he is a serial killer who only targets other murderers.
similars.stars: Michael C. Hall, Jennifer Carpenter, David Zayas

similars.title: You
similars.plot: A dangerously charming, intensely obsessive young man goes to extreme measures to insert himself into the lives of those he is transfixed by.
similars.stars: Penn Badgley, Victoria Pedretti, Ambyr Childers
